mapper.select: select article.id, article.status_id, article.user_id, article.catalogue_id, article.title, article.content, article.hot, article.gmt_create, article.gmt_modified, article.deleted, user.username as author, status.name as status from article left join catalogue on article.catalogue_id = catalogue.id left join user on article.user_id = user.id left join status on article.status_id = status.id
